description.value: The catlike pahtra are agile and graceful, even in low or zero gravity. Small hoverjets in your feet (or similar appendages) afford you similar responsiveness. When you are knocked @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.QnGpBSHSTiszjPSb]{Off-Kilter}, you donâ€™t gain the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.MZ8OoH1GE9qDMyCD]{Flat-Footed} condition or take the normal penalty to attacks. In addition, you can steady yourself as a swift action instead of a move action.
